author: Jake Boyer
title: The Best, Worst & Most â€œWTFâ€ Outfits From the 2017 Grammy Awards
text:
As you may have heard, last night saw the telecast of the 2017 Grammys. Adele was the big winner of the night sweeping all the major categories, which was a choice that has led many to feel (rightfully) miffed, but we digress.
However, there is one, non- Lemonade -related aspect that we can all handily agree on: who crushed and who utterly flopped the red carpet. So without further ado, here are our picks for the best, the worst and the most â€˜seriously WTFâ€™ looks of the night.
Solange embraced the idea of dressing like a living award instead of winning one.
#Solange #Grammys #RedCarpet #aboutlastnight #iamrollingout 
A photo posted by Rolling Out (@rollingout) on Feb 13, 2017 at 6:29am PST 

Yes ScHoolboy Q. Just, yes.
